name: Planet Mort-E on the dip space

description:
[This Game it´s REALLY broken and i´m NOT going to fix it]
Ludum Dare 38 Game.

Theme: A small world.

Press to rotate the planet Mort-e and shoot the meteors to survive and get the sweet sauce.

made by: Gabriel Aldaya (geak) & Gaston Fernandez (gef).

Any similarity with Rick & Morty is pure coincidence.
